mapper.insert: insert into CHAT_MEMBER values (#{chatroomNo}, #{memberNo}, default, default, default)
mapper.delete: delete from CHAT_MEMBER where CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo} and MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.update: update CHAT_MEMBER set BLOCK_YN = 'Y' where CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo} and MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
update CHAT_MEMBER set ENTER_YN = 'Y' where CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo} and MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
update CHAT_MEMBER set ENTER_YN = 'N' where MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} and CHATROOM_NO != #{chatroomNo}
update CHAT_MEMBER set NON_CHECK_MSG = NON_CHECK_MSG +1 where CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo} and ENTER_YN = 'N'
update CHAT_MEMBER set NON_CHECK_MSG = 0 where CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} and ENTER_YN = 'Y'
mapper.select: select count (*) from CHAT_MEMBER where CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo} and ENTER_YN = 'N' and BLOCK_YN = 'N'
select * from CHAT_MEMBER where CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo} and MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} and BLOCK_YN = 'N'

select C.CHATROOM_NO, C.MEMBER_NO, M.NICKNAME, M.PROFILE_FILE_PATH, M.MEMBER_YN, C.BLOCK_YN from CHAT_MEMBER C join member M on C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO where C.CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo} and M.MEMBER_YN = 'Y' and C.BLOCK_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE CHAT_MEMBER SET ENTER_YN = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAT_MEMBER WHERE CHATROOM_NO = #{chatroomNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BLOCK_YN = 'Y'
